intro: Oxydectes tiglium, commonly known as the tiglium or the tiglic plant, is a member of the Rutaceae family. It is a shrub or small tree that typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and small, yellowish-green flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, winged seeds. Oxydectes tiglium is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
